subject: Looking for order. It hasn't been shipped yet.
description_text: I haven't seen anything of my order for the haptic racing pedals.

conversations.body_text: Hi Tom belsky,       It is found that your order will be shipped in two packages:  1. Regarding the pedal,Due to product upgrades, this item has been out of stock for two weeks. Once the upgrades are complete, we will ship the latest version to you as soon as possible to enhance your experience. We expect to ship within the next few days. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  2. The power supply was arranged to be shipped to you on the 17th.  You can track your shipping information via the following link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047231333245
